title: Demonkin
description: Infernal and cunning beings, unleashing chaotic and destructive forces upon their enemies while manipulating darkness to their advantage.

title: Human
description: Adaptable and resilient fighters, employing versatile tactics and strategic acumen to overcome any challenge they face.

title: Dwarf
description: Stalwart and unyielding defenders, harnessing the power of stone and steel to crush enemies and fortify their defenses against all odds.

title: Elf
description: Graceful and attuned to nature, blending magic and agility to dominate the battlefield while healing allies and moving unseen through the forest.
